articles.author: TN Tech Desk
articles.title: Sun Spews Powerful X-Class Solar Flares; Radio Blackout Hits Australia, Indonesia, India, and East Africa - Times Now
articles.description: Space weather forecast has suggested that the Sun has unleashed multiple X-class solar flares which are considered to be the most powerful. It even caused an R3-level radio blackout over Australia, Indonesia, India, and East Africa. Know all the details here.
